[[inst_lhui]]
==== LHUI

*Syntax:* lhui [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load unsigned 16-bit halfword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lhui.svg[LHUI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_IMM
